plot: Does a good trailer guarantee a good movie? Hell no! So each week, we break down the trailers that Hollywood serves up in Preview Review.
plot_en: Does a good trailer guarantee a good movie? Hell no! So each week, we break down the trailers that Hollywood serves up in Preview Review.

title: Preview Review
